sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Planetary Mixer for intensive mixing and granulation of pharmaceutical powders.
sections.scope: Applicable to mixing and granulation activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Verify cleanliness of mixing bowl and beater/whisk.
Secure the bowl in the mixer base and lock safety guards.
Load ingredients as per the manufacturing formula.
Power ON the mixer and select the appropriate speed setting.
Start mixing and monitor for uniform dispersion.
Add granulating fluid slowly if preparing a wet mass.
Scrape the bowl sides periodically for thorough mixing.
Continue until the desired consistency or endpoint is achieved.
Discharge the mixed mass for further processing.
Clean the bowl and mixing attachments thoroughly after use.
Document mixing parameters and observations in the logbook.
precautions: Do not exceed the bowl capacity for effective mixing.
Never place hands or tools in the bowl during operation.
Ensure the bowl is properly locked before starting the motor.
Add liquids gradually to avoid over-wetting the mass.
Wear appropriate PPE for dust control.
